snippet.title: Inky and the Alien Aquarium Game Trailer: New for the Game Boy Advance
snippet.description:
Inky and the Alien Aquarium is a brand new puzzle game made completely from scratch for the Game Boy Advance, emulators, and systems capable of playing ROM files (PC, RetroPie, Analogue Pocket, etc.) It's a block pushing puzzle game similar to Lolo's Adventure and Sokoban, but with an open world.

Inky, a flapjack octopus, along with 15 other sea creatures have been abducted and put on display in an alien aquarium. Being a clever octopus with an abhorrence to captivity, Inky immediately makes a break for it.  Help Inky solve puzzles, save the sea creatures, and escape the mothership.

Follow on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pocketpulp/inky-and-the-alien-aquarium-new-gba-homebrew-puzzle-game

Get the demo: 
https://forms.pulp.biz/inky-and-the-alien-aquarium-a-new-homebrew-for-the-game-boy-advance-0

#gameboyadvance #homebrew #retrogaming #indiedev #pixelart #puzzlegame #gba #gametrailer #kickstarter
